WorkItem.Description:
* implement a language service host
* let it return files that start with a double backslash (UNC share) or with a forward slash (unix style)
* have two files and let one file import the other
-> the compiler gets stuck in an endless loop (PullTypeResolver.prototype.findTypeSymbolForDynamicModule)
WorkItem.Summary: endless loop with certain file paths and import-statement

Comments.Message:
